firstParagraphAlmostDone: Peeranha is not a typical Q&A platform. It’s powered by blockchain.
thirdParagraphAlmostDone: We're happy to cover this fee for you but we'll need your email and phone number to manually check that you're a real person. This process could take 1-2 weeks.
weWillNotify: We will notify you when your account will be ready. Usually it takes no longer than 4 hours.
theWayBlockchainAccountWorks: We are creating a blockchain account for you to interact with the platform. Only you will have access to the private key for the account. Our service will be authorized to post a limited set of actions on the platform on behalf of your account in order to provide you with a convenient experience. You'll be able to revoke that permission of service account at any time.
dontWorryAboutBlockchainAccount: Sounds too complicated? Don’t worry! Just remember to write down your Secret Phrase and save it in a safe place. Secret Phrase is the only way to access your blockchain account and the rewards that you'll earn. We will guide you when it is time to use your Secret Phrase to withdraw the rewards.
peeranhaIsNotTypical: Peeranha is not a typical Q&A platform. It’s powered by blockchain.
weAreHappyToCover: If you prefer to use a wallet application to manage your blockchain account, then wallet sign up option is available.
ifYouLikeToSkip: New to blockchain? Do not worry! You will be able to access Peeranha using your email address and password as any other website.
doYouHaveAlreadyAccount: Do you already have an account?
youHaveToSaveKeys: Secret Phrase is the only way to access your blockchain account and rewards that you'll earn! Write your Secret Phrase on a piece of paper and store it in a secure location. Alternatively, store your Secret Phrase in a password manager like 1Password.
title: Registration
iSaveSecretPhrase: I saved Secret Phrase in a safe place. I understand that Secret Phrase is the only way to access my blockchain account and rewards.
userAlreadyRegistered: User with such identity has been already registered
